code: import _asyncToGenerator from"@babel/runtime/helpers/asyncToGenerator";import ExponentAV from"./ExponentAV";import{requestFullscreen,exitFullscreen}from"./FullscreenUtils.web";export default{get name(){return'ExpoVideoManager';},get ScaleNone(){return'none';},get ScaleToFill(){return'fill';},get ScaleAspectFit(){return'contain';},get ScaleAspectFill(){return'cover';},setFullscreen:function(){var _setFullscreen=_asyncToGenerator(function*(element,isFullScreenEnabled){if(isFullScreenEnabled){yield requestFullscreen(element);}else{yield exitFullscreen(element);}return ExponentAV.getStatusForVideo(element);});function setFullscreen(_x,_x2){return _setFullscreen.apply(this,arguments);}return setFullscreen;}()};
